sentence.Network_en: By pushing aside unpleasant thoughts they merely repress these thoughts.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们对不愉快的想法不予理会，其结果仅仅是压制了这些想法。

sentence.Network_en: I couldn't repress a sigh of admiration.
sentence.Network_cn: 我忍不住发出一声赞叹。

sentence.Network_en: People who repress their emotions risk having nightmares.
sentence.Network_cn: 压抑情感的人容易做噩梦。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'keep back (something objectionable)'): from Latin repress- 'pressed back, checked', from the verb reprimere, from re- 'back' + premere 'to press'

entry.def: If you repress a feeling, you make a deliberate effort not to show or have this feeling.

example.ex: People who repress their emotions risk having nightmares...
example.tran: 压抑情感的人容易做噩梦。

example.ex: It is anger that is repressed that leads to violence and loss of control.
example.tran: 是被压制的愤怒导致暴力和失控。

entry.def: If you repress a smile, sigh, or moan, you try hard not to smile, sigh, or moan.

example.ex: I couldn't repress a sigh of admiration.
example.tran: 我忍不住发出一声赞叹。

entry.def: If a section of society is repressed, their freedom is restricted by the people who have authority over them.

example.ex: Turkish Kurds have been repressed for decades by the Ankara government.
example.tran: 土耳其的库尔德人已经被安卡拉政府压制了几十年。

example.ex: ...a UN resolution banning him from repressing his people.
example.tran: 禁止他压制民众的联合国决议

means.word_mean: 1. put down by force or intimidation;

sentences.sentence: "The government quashes any attempt of an uprising"
"China keeps down her dissidents very efficiently"
"The rich landowners subjugated the peasants working the land"

auth_sentence.content: He said those communities repress the nonbelievers among them.
auth_sentence.res_content: He said those communities repress the nonbelievers among them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He said those communities repress the nonbelievers among them.

auth_sentence.content: The Genoese, eager to repress the rise of 1734.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Genoese, eager to repress the rise of 1734.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Genoese, eager to repress the rise of 1734.

auth_sentence.content: The convulsive sobs which the girl vainly tried to repress.
auth_sentence.res_content: The convulsive sobs which the girl vainly tried to repress.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The convulsive sobs which the girl vainly tried to repress.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可压缩的, 可压榨的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compress[v.压缩]+ible能……的→adj.可压缩的, 可压榨的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
stems_affixes.word_buile: depress[v.压制,压抑]+ed……的→adj.沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给人深刻印象的,感人的
stems_affixes.word_buile: impress印象,引人注目+ive……的→adj.给人深刻印象的,感人的
press挤压+ing……的→adj.急迫的
compress[v.压缩]+ion表名词→n.压缩,压紧,浓缩
depress[v.压制,压抑]+ion表名词→n.消沉;不景气萧条期
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
stems_affixes.word_buile: express表达,表示+ion→n.表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
impress印象,引人注目+ion表名词→n.印象,感想;盖印,压痕
oppress[v.压迫,压制]+ion表名词→n.压迫

stems_affixes.value_cn: 压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
stems_affixes.word_buile: press挤压+ure表名词→n.压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
suppress[v.镇压,压制]+ion表名词→n.镇压,压制
press挤压→n.&n.&v.压, 按
com一起+press压→一起压→压缩
de向下+press压→向下压→压制→情绪低下
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达
im进+press挤压→压进去→盖印→印入头脑→留下印象
op加强动作+press挤压→拼命压→压迫
re回+press挤压→压回去
sup下+press压→压下去

sentences.en: She repressed her desire to mention his name.
sentences.cn: 她压制住自己没有提他的名字。

sentences.en: The military government repressed the striking workers.
sentences.cn: 军政府镇压了罢工的工人。
